ComicInfo.Summary: The Battle Begins in Earnest! The mysterious villain's plans continue to unfold with deadly precision as Witchblade, The Darkness, Angelus, Tom Judge, and Magdalena are drawn into a conflict with the heroes of Cyberforce. But even as friends become foes, Aphrodite IV arrives with murderous intentions. Can an opponent who doesn't tire or even feel pain be defeated? Each issue will also feature a Top Cow Origin backup written by Marz and drawn by a superstar artist.
ComicInfo.Title: "Artifacts" part 6 of 13; Origin: "Coin of Solomon"
ComicInfo.Characters: Ballistic,Ellis,Witchblade,Sabine,Curator,Danielle Baptiste,Mali,Cyblade,Aphrodite IV,Ji Xi,Sara Pezzini,Ripclaw,Necromancer,Glorianna Silver,Hope Pezzini,The Angelus,Magdalena,Jackie Estacado,Tom Judge,Alina Enstrom,Velocity,Ian Nottingham
